mutants.code:
def reverse_phrase(phrase):
    words = phrase.split()
    reversed_words = [word[::-1] for word in reversed(words)]
    capitalized_words = [word.capitalize() for word in reversed_words]
    reversed_phrase = ''.join(capitalized_words)
    return reversed_phrase

def reverse_phrase(phrase):
    words = phrase.split()
    reversed_words = [word[::+1] for word in reversed(words)]
    capitalized_words = [word.capitalize() for word in reversed_words]
    reversed_phrase = ' '.join(capitalized_words)
    return reversed_phrase

def reverse_phrase(phrase):
    words = phrase.split()
    reversed_words = [word[::-2] for word in reversed(words)]
    capitalized_words = [word.capitalize() for word in reversed_words]
    reversed_phrase = ' '.join(capitalized_words)
    return reversed_phrase

def reverse_phrase(phrase):
    words = phrase.split()
    reversed_words = [word[::-0] for word in reversed(words)]
    capitalized_words = [word.capitalize() for word in reversed_words]
    reversed_phrase = ' '.join(capitalized_words)
    return reversed_phrase

def reverse_phrase(phrase):
    words = phrase.split()
    reversed_words = [word[::-0] for word in reversed(words)]
    capitalized_words = [word.capitalize() for word in reversed_words]
    reversed_phrase = ' '.join(capitalized_words)

def reverse_phrase(phrase):
    words = phrase.split()
    reversed_words = [word[::--1] for word in reversed(words)]
    capitalized_words = [word.capitalize() for word in reversed_words]
    reversed_phrase = ' '.join(capitalized_words)
    return reversed_phrase
